questions.question: What does a red traffic light signal mean?
questions.explanation: A red traffic light signal means you must stop before entering the crosswalk or intersection.

questions.question: What does a yellow diamond-shaped sign indicate?
questions.explanation: Yellow diamond-shaped signs are used to warn drivers about upcoming road conditions and hazards.

questions.question: Who has the right-of-way at an intersection with no crosswalks?
questions.explanation: At an intersection with no crosswalks, vehicles have the right-of-way over pedestrians.

questions.question: When can you exceed the posted speed limit?
questions.explanation: You must not exceed the posted speed limit at any time.

questions.question: Where is it illegal to park?
options: On the side of a road
questions.explanation: It's illegal to park in an intersection as it obstructs traffic.

questions.question: What should you do when driving in fog?
questions.explanation: In foggy conditions, using low beams will provide better visibility than high beams.

questions.question: What does a flashing yellow signal light mean?
questions.explanation: A flashing yellow signal light means proceed with caution.

questions.question: Who has the right-of-way in a roundabout?
questions.explanation: Vehicles already in the roundabout have the right-of-way over those entering.

questions.question: What is the maximum speed limit on a rural interstate highway in Arizona?
questions.explanation: The maximum speed limit on a rural interstate highway in Arizona is 75 mph.

questions.question: What is the standard parking distance from a fire hydrant?
questions.explanation: You must not park within 15 feet of a fire hydrant.
